com.bandyer.call_center_sdk.call_center

Class CallCenter

  • com.bandyer.call_center_sdk.call_center.CallCenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnCallCreationObserver, OnCallEventObserver

    public class CallCenter
implements OnCallCreationObserver, OnCallEventObserver

    CallCenterInstance

    The call center has the responsibility of creation of the calls and to notify the user when an incoming call has been received
